body.p: Residence: Campbellsville, Taylor County, KY. A Harrodsburg, Kentucky-born lawyer. Son of James Montague. Married Margaret E. Cox. Father of Sallie (Montague) Hubbard, Virginia (Montague) Jenkins, Mary (Montague) Baker, Margaret (Montague) Phillips, Lelia Montague, and Robert Montague.
